mapper.select: SELECT rm.id, m1.nickname AS reporterNickname, m1.id AS reporterId, m2.nickname as reportedNickname, m2.id as reportedId, mrt.type as reportType, rm.processedAt FROM reportedMember as rm JOIN member as m1 ON rm.repoterId = m1.id JOIN member as m2 ON rm.reportedId = m2.id JOIN memberReportType as mrt ON rm.typeId = mrt.id LIMIT #{offset},#{size};
